sentences.literal: Then went to Jin, saw Duke Ping of Jin.
Duke Ping set out wine at Shi Hui terrace.

sentences.chinese: 酒酣，靈公曰：「今者來，聞新聲，請奏之。」
sentences.literal: Wine abundant, Duke Ling said: 'Now coming, heard new sound, please play it.'

sentences.chinese: 即令師涓坐師曠旁，援琴鼓之。
sentences.literal: Then commanded Master Juan sit beside Master Kuang, took up zither and played it.

sentences.chinese: 未終，師曠撫而止之曰：「此亡國之聲也，不可遂。」
sentences.literal: Not yet finished, Master Kuang patted and stopped it saying: 'This is perished state's sound, cannot continue.'
Duke Ping said: 'From what way comes?'
Master Kuang said: 'Shi Yan made it.

sentences.chinese: 與紂為靡靡之樂，武王伐紂，師延東走，自投濮水之中，故聞此聲必於濮水之上，先聞此聲者國削。」
sentences.literal: Made decadent music with Zhou, King Wu attacked Zhou, Shi Yan east fled, threw himself into Pu Water midst, therefore hearing this sound must be above Pu Water, first hearing this sound state reduced.'

sentences.chinese: 平公曰：「寡人所好者音也，願遂聞之。」
sentences.literal: Duke Ping said: 'I what like is sound, wish to continue hearing it.'
Master Juan played and finished it.
Duke Ping said: 'Sound nothing more sorrowful than this?'
